content.rendered:
PASSENGERS BUSINESS CLASS ECONOMY CLASS
All Passengers 2 pieces of hand baggage, max weight 8 kg each, max size 55 cm X 38cm X 20cm plus 1 piece of hand baggage, max weight 8 kg, max size 55cm X 38cm X20 cm

 

Air Namibia Checked Baggage

Air Namibia Excess Baggage
